operating_fees.info: Landing fees for aircraft up to MTOW 1 t
Parking fees for aircraft up to MTOW 2 t
Passenger fees for flights outside EU and Schengen area

parking_fees.info: Parking area aircraft up to MTOW 2 t (per initiated day)
Parking area aircraft over MTOW 2 t per day and per each initiated tonne
Hangar per each initiated tonne and each initiated day

passanger_fees.info: Custom and immigration clearance of passengers for flights outside EU and Schengen area (per passenger)
Security check for crew, passengers and baggage (physical check) for flights outside EU and Schengen area (per person)

other_information: Payment of landing charges: Landing charges are paid in the air traffic office or at the unit Providing information to known traffic in building of aerodrome control tower.
